layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x180
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x180
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x164
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x142 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 200x142
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,60) size 200x22 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (60,60) size 80x22 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 20x19
                text run at (1,1) width 20: "foo"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,142) size 262x22 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 39x19
          text run at (1,1) width 39: "260px"
